events.message: We have received Jane Doe's application for the software engineer position and look forward to reviewing her qualifications carefully.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster due to her extensive software development experience mentioned in the resume.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage Jane Doe's candidate journey for the software engineer role opening.
Completed the initial screening call with Jane Doe, she demonstrated solid knowledge of software development principles and enthusiasm for the role.
Received a positive response from Jane confirming her availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering panel for Jane Doe on May 10th at 10:00 AM.
Jane completed the technical interview and impressed the engineering team with her problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
HR interview with Jane has been scheduled for May 13th at 2:00 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
Jane's HR interview went well; she aligned with company values and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
An employment offer has been proposed to Jane, including a competitive salary package and detailed benefits information.
Jane provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
Jane formally accepted the job offer and is set to begin onboarding next month as a software engineer.
Jane started the onboarding process successfully, completing the necessary paperwork and initial training sessions.
The hiring process for Jane Doe has been closed successfully with her joining as a full-time software engineer.
